DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to validate novel assays for serum biomarkers of lipid metabolism (PCSK9 and LDL receptor) and to obtain information about how these biomarkers differ in subjects with normal or high cholesterol levels
DOC.brief_title: An Experimental Medicine Study to Evaluate Serum Biomarkers of Lipid Metabolism
DOC.criteria: Hypercholesterolemia Statin monotherapy Significant acute or chronic illness Secondary causes of hypercholesterolemia
